grounds_for_transfer.ground_1: Disallowed cross-examination of Noor Muhammad regarding identification of accused.
grounds_for_transfer.ground_2: Disallowed cross-examination of Mst. Allah Rakhi regarding identification of accused due to lack of identification parade request.
grounds_for_transfer.ground_3: Prosecution allowed to produce evidence in instalments, prejudicing the defense.
grounds_for_transfer.ground_4: Presiding Officer threatened to cancel bails upon defense objection regarding witness production.

magistrate_report.denial_of_threats: Magistrate denied threatening to cancel bails.
magistrate_report.cross_examination_noor_muhammad: Disallowed due to Noor Muhammad's admission of inability to identify accused.
magistrate_report.cross_examination_mst_allah_rakhi: Disallowed for unsound reasons; accused should have been allowed to cross-examine.

judgment_summary.transfer_order: Case transferred to another Court of competent jurisdiction.
judgment_summary.reasoning: Procedure adopted prejudiced the defense and disallowed valid cross-examination.
